name: Mines of Dalarnia Mining Apes Collection

metadata.name: Mining Ape #1
metadata.description: The Mining Apes Collection is issued by Mines of Dalarnia for the early explorers on the Dalarnia planet. Mining Apes are 10,000 NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. They are generated using algorithms and each Mining Ape is unique. Mining Ape NFTs are a status symbol and it offers you long term benefit as you contribute to the Dalarnia community. For more details, please visit minesofdalarnia.com, or join our community: https://t.me/MinesOfDalarnia
